about.summary: Provides a framework for generating virtual species distributions, a procedure increasingly used in ecology to improve species distribution models. This package integrates the existing methodological approaches with the objective of generating virtual species distributions with increased ecological realism.

Provides a framework for generating virtual species distributions, a procedure increasingly used in ecology to improve species distribution models. This package integrates the existing methodological approaches with the objective of generating virtual species distributions with increased ecological realism.

name: r-virtualspecies
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '1.5.1' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-virtualspecies
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/virtualspecies_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/virtualspecies/virtualspecies_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: a3b293aacfcd9df1defe2c8bcbd9f891ffea70f1dda4d215a6211a2c19570651

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-ade4
    - r-raster
    - r-rworldmap
    - r-sp
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-ade4
    - r-raster
    - r-rworldmap
    - r-sp

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('virtualspecies')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('virtualspecies')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: http://borisleroy.com/virtualspecies
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: Provides a framework for generating virtual species distributions, a procedure increasingly
    used in ecology to improve species distribution models. This package integrates
    the existing methodological approaches with the objective of generating virtual
    species distributions with increased ecological realism.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - colineroyaux

# Package: virtualspecies
# Type: Package
# Title: Generation of Virtual Species Distributions
# Version: 1.5.1
# Date: 2019-12-12
# Author: Boris Leroy [cre, aut], Christine N. Meynard [ctb], Celine Bellard [ctb], Franck Courchamp [ctb], Robin Delsol [ctb], Willson Gaul [ctb]
# Maintainer: Boris Leroy <leroy.boris@gmail.com>
# Description: Provides a framework for generating virtual species distributions, a procedure increasingly used in ecology to improve species distribution models. This package integrates the existing methodological approaches with the objective of generating virtual species distributions with increased ecological realism.
# Encoding: UTF-8
# License: GPL (>= 2.0)
# Depends: raster
# Imports: ade4, graphics, grDevices, methods, rworldmap, sp, stats, utils
# URL: http://borisleroy.com/virtualspecies
# RoxygenNote: 7.0.2
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2019-12-12 12:30:25 UTC; Boris
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2019-12-12 13:10:02 UTC
